shrimp.name: Mix
shrimp.description: Performs a linear blend between A and B
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: out
output.description: The resulting mix between A and B

shrimp.usage: Mix returns x*(1-a)+y*a, that is, it performs a linear blend between values x and y. The types of x and y must be identical, but may be any of float, point, vector, normal, or color. The variants that operate on colors or point-like objects operate on a component by component basis (e.g: separately for x, y, and z).
